info.title: ClearBank Financial Institutions API
info.description: ClearBank API endpoints for creating and managing accounts and transactions.

post.summary: This endpoint is used to initiate an Automated ISA Transfer In.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the account.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The information required to create an automated transfer in for ISA.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API Token, obtained from the ClearBank Portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request; valid for 24 hours, max length 83.

X-Correlation-Id.description: A unique identifier which should be referenced in any issue with any API call.

type.description: A URI reference RFC3986 that identifies the problem type.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see RFC7231, Section 3.4)

status.description: The HTTP status code (RFC7231, Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

errors.description: Human-readable validation errors specific to this occurrence of the problem.

name.description: Indicates the purpose of the link.

templated.description: Indicates whether you need to populate any parameters (true) or can use the link as is (false).

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information that is used to create an Automated ISA Transfer In request.

previousIsaSortCode.description: The sort code of the previous ISA account.

previousIsaAccountNumber.description: The account number of the previous ISA account.

previousIsaRollNumber.description: The building society identification number for the previous ISA account.

extendedCurrentYearType.description: Indicator to include or exclude the current year subscriptions from the transfer.

allPreviousYears.description: Indicates whether the investor wants to transfer all previous years.

amountFromPreviousYearsSubscription.description:
Partial amount that can be made up of previous years subscriptions only or a combination of the current and previous year’s subscriptions.
AmountFromPreviousYearsSubscription value is not allowed if all previous years funds are being transferred (AllPreviousYears field = true).

earlyClosureWaiver.description:
If this field is true, penalty/charges/interest loss in lieu of the fixed/notice period (if any) will be borne by the customer.
If set to false ceding party would wait for the maturity / notice period to complete.

cedingPartySun.description:
Ceding Party Service User Number (SUN)
An identifier for an authorised user of the Bacs Service, subject to registered privileges
SUN must have an associated Cash ISA Transfer Service licence
Always 6 numeric digits.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information representing the Automated ISA Transfer In response and associated hypermedia links.

isaAccountAutomatedTransferIn.description: The ISA Automated Transfer In response details.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information representing the ISA Automated Transfer In response.

urn.description:
Unique Reference Number (URN)
A unique number that links a Transfer Request and all subsequent related messages, including payments.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information that is used to create an ISA automated transfer in state update request.

state.description: State of an ISA automated transfer in.

reason.description: Reason for ISA automated transfer in state.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information that is used to resubmit an ISA automated transfer in request.

sortCode.description: Sort code of the ISA account.

accountNumber.description: Account number of the ISA account.

rollNumber.description: Roll number of the ISA account.

effectiveDateTransfer.description: The date the transfer in is effective from.

extendedCurrentYearType.description: Sets whether to include or exclude current year subscriptions.

allPreviousYears.description: Indicates whether investor wants to transfer all previous years subscriptions.

amountFromPreviousYearsSubscription.description: Partial amount that can be made up of previous years subscriptions only or a combination of the current and previous year’s subscriptions.

earlyClosureWaiver.description: Gets or sets if penalty/charges/interest loss in lieu of the fixed/notice period (if any) will be borne by the customer.

cedingPartySun.description: The SUN of the ceding party.

ClearBank.FI.API.Accounts.Versions.V1.Mo.description: Information that is used to create an ISA automated transfer out state update request.

state.description: State of an ISA automated transfer out.

reason.description: Reason for ISA automated transfer out state.
